title.full: Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader Full Version

description.full: Do you think you are smarter than a 5th grader? Now is your chance to prove it! Over 6,000 questions in 21 subjects that test your mental mettle. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
description.short: Join Mr. Foxworthyâ€™s class and play the Are You Smarter than a 5th Grader trivia game where every question is based on grade school curriculum and the answers are elementary.  Step up to the podium and put your smarts on the line with over 6,000 grade school questions in 21 subjects.  Outwit, outplay and just plain cheat your way to the One Million Dollar grand prize. Collect extra credit to unlock Achievements.  What are you waiting for? Prove once and for all that you are indeed smarter than a
